posts.post_title: Wanted To Buy: 1875 Hartford Blues CDV w/Candy Cummings
posts.post_content: Since I wasn't able to pick up the one this past week in the Heritage Auction, does anyone have the above card that they would consider selling to me? If so, please e-mail me privately at: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
